abstract: Cisco says it will buy the NDS Group, a provider of content streaming and security services, to help expand its own video offerings.
snippet: Cisco says it will buy the NDS Group, a provider of content streaming and security services, to help expand its own video offerings.
lead_paragraph: 6:43 p.m. | Updated Cisco Systems said on Thursday that it planned to buy the NDS Group, a provider of content streaming and security software, for about $5 billion to help expand its next-generation video services.

headline.main: Cisco to Buy NDS, a Video Services Firm, for $5 Billion

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Mark Scott
